actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations, S. Rept. 94-603.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-660.

official_title: A resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-660) Authorizes expenditures of $1,150,000 by the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations for inquiries and investigation from March 1, 1976, through February 28, 1977. Allocates $60,000 to be expended for the procurement of consultant services. Requires the committee to report its findings and recommendations for legislation to the Senate no later than February 28, 1977.

titles.title: A resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations.
